title: Alex Smith Retires ; MVP Odds with Matt Money Smith
itunes:title: Alex Smith Retires ; MVP Odds with Matt Money Smith
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL starting with the incredible career story that is Alex Smith, coming to an end (10:36). Some players are sitting out voluntary OTAs (20:04) and the Bengals have some new uniforms that really get under Marc's skin (29:30). Matt Money Smith joins the show to give Gregg a little grief for his music references (33:38) and then sits in on some MVP candidates for 2021 (42:13).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
